王 ≈ A̲̅ 𓌺̲ "mark" מָרָא mārā marquis Markus

መራ mära = lead <> 𒁈 BÁRA Führ… መርሐ märḥä መረሀ märähǝ

𒂷𒆠 mal-ki malik "ruler"

𒂷𒆠 GÁ~KI ≈ king

malik “Lord” mālik मालिक <> Persian مالک mâlek <> Arabic مَالِك mālik “king”

𒁲 ≈ 𒑱𒐺𒁹 sa-a 𒅖𒆪 mil-ku counsel

𒌋𒌋 MAN menar = manage 𓏠 ⲙⲁⲗⲗⲟⲛ 𜎦𜑊𜐶 ᵏMenik malik König “king” Menes

Malku=šarru (king/shar) in Kassite

𓎟 μall मालिक mālik *mark(graf) מָרָא mārā marquis Markus
𒂗𒆠 Merkur/Malik ☿ King Mark(Graf)/Mattheus @ Mehrgarh
𒂗𒈨𒅕𒃸 En.Merkar, founder of Uruk (father of Lugal Banda 𒈗𒌉𒁕 'Son of the King')

𒈠𒀠𒅗𒀀 ma-al-ka-a malik markant:sovereign

𒈠𒇷𒆪 ma-li-ku
𒈠𒇷𒆪 adviser, counsellor

myakã

導く みちびく michibiku

𒉆 ≈ 𒌋𒌋 Amun 𒉆𒉺𒋼𒋛 ˢʸnamensik mensik > malik ? 𒉆 ≈ 𒌋𒌋 Amun king in 𒉆𒂗 nam-en ˢʸnamen syn-amun shar-amen the office of en-priest; kingship

𒊮𒊨𒅇 šag₄kuš₂u₃ šag kušu soothe, counsel "to soothe to take counsel with" #malāku @ malik
